sentences.sContent: How do you get from here to Colchester?
sentences.sCn: 从这里到科尔切斯特怎么走？

sentences.sContent: an empire stretching from Syria to Spain
sentences.sCn: 版图从叙利亚一直延伸到西班牙的帝国

sentences.sContent: The hotel is on the main road from Newport.
sentences.sCn: 宾馆位于从纽波特出来的主路上。

sentences.sContent: Ernest twice ran away from home.
sentences.sCn: 欧内斯特两次离家出走。

trans.tranOther: starting at a particular place or position
